sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Tims carry Will inside and call their caretaker

sentences.name: Tims
sentences.sentence: Chloe. . . Chloe! ! ! Can you come here!?

sentences.name: Chloe
sentences.sentence: What is it, Tims? Lower your voice. You could wake up the children. So did you fix the bell?

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Chloe knows how hard it is for Will since Anna’s death. She doesn’t say a single word.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Immediately She takes some towels and clothes and gives it to Will. It is clear that Will is not in a good shape whatsoever.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Will dry himself and change into the new clothes. When he comes back from the bathroom, he smells a familiar scent.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Chloe prepares a hot cocoa to warm his body.

sentences.name: Chloe
sentences.sentence: Drink this Will, then rest. You can sleep in an empty bedroom on the 2nd floor. We can talk tomorrow.
